definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: :Da 6:9 decree, law (Syr.; Pers. loan-word, v. BH);—´[[ד]]: abs. Da 6:16, Da 7:25, cstr. Ezr 7:14 +; emph. [[דָּתָא]] Ezr 7:12 +; sf. [[דָּֽתְכוֹן]] Da 2:9;—
decree of king Da 2:13, Da 2:15, Ezr 7:26; c. sf. Da 2:9 decree against you.
unchangeable law of Medes and Pers. Da 6:9, Da 6:13, Da 6:16.
law of God (in mouth of non-Jews): Da 6:6, Ezr 7:12, Ezr 7:14, Ezr 7:21, Ezr 7:26, so (abs.) Da 7:25; laws of God Ezr 7:25.
